Name: Issue 270
Summary: Xamarin.Mac, Tools, UI Designs, MVU and of course Xamarin.Forms
Introduction: Happy Friday everyone,  It's been a pretty quiet week on the blog-o-sphere so it's a lighter edition today. But as always, some great links for Xamarin Developers.  Kick back and enjoy your weekend. ❤ Kym

Articles.Title: Xamarin Documentation What's New?
Articles.Description: The Microsoft docs team has put together a What's New page for Xamarin that gives you an easy way to see all the Xamarin related doc updates. Neato!
Articles.Author: Xamarin Docs Releases

Articles.Title: Is Redesigning Your Mobile App A Bad Idea?
Articles.Description: The Scrabble GO, Instacart and YouTube mobile apps have recently undergone disruptive redesigns. Were they worth it in the end?
Articles.Author: Suzanne Scacca

Articles.Title: Reverse engineering tools for .NET applications
Articles.Description: Bartosz has a look at different tools for .NET reverse engineering and decompiling.
Articles.Author: Bartosz Wójcik

Articles.Title: Write Xamarin.Mac Apps With JetBrains Rider
Articles.Description: Get started with created Xamarin.Mac apps.  This is also a good intro to those looking at using JetBrains Rider as well.
Articles.Author: Khalid Abuhakmeh

Articles.Title: UI Challenge - BMI Calculator
Articles.Description: Naweed has used the new Shapes features to create a cool UI with animations. Very nice.
Articles.Author: Naweed Akram

Articles.Title: RowDefinition & ColumnDefinition through binding
Articles.Description: Under one of Geralds YouTube videos about the simplified grid RowDefinition and ColumnDefinition syntax, he got the question how to do this in with data-binding. In this post he shows covers that exact topic.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Show/Hide password using EventTrigger
Articles.Description: A common requirement in mobile applications is the ability to show/hide a password field. In this post, Charlin shows a very simple way to achieve this by using EventTrigger.
Articles.Author: Charlin Agramonte

Articles.Title: Creating a Binding Library in Xamarin (Part. 2)
Articles.Description: Rendy continues his series on creating a binding library in Xamarin for Pay.Card SDK.
Articles.Author: Rendy Del Rosario

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict 212 - Model-View-Update (MVU) - What, Why, How
Articles.Description: It is all in the name - Model-View-Update (MVU) - What, Why, How. Join James and Frank for a great discussion.
Articles.Author: Merge Conflict

Articles.Title: Yet Another Podcast - VS Mac & More
Articles.Description: Jon Galloway talks to Jesse Liberty about VS Mac.
Articles.Author: Jesse Liberty

Articles.Title: ReactiveUI Virtual Conf
Articles.Description: Get Ready for the First Ever ReactiveUI Virtual Conf. There are some great speakers, so if you are looking at expanding your knowledge of Reactive technologies, sign up for this.
Articles.Author: ReactiveUI
